body: Hi Claudio, 1. The newest version of addGlazing (which you can download from github or find in the attached file) has a toggle for keeping the window as a single window. If this is still not what you are looking for then you can create the glazing as a separate geometry. 2. You can just use the schedule component to create the new schedule.
